name: Alone... (itch)
description:
This is a simple test to see if I can build for web! The controls obviously work best on a touch screen, however it's totally playable with a mouse or trackpad. (I might be bias due to the months of play testing on Mac when developing!)

Controls:

Click and drag the mouse on the screen (Up and down). The controls are ULTRA sensitive as it's required when going at faster speeds!
